features.title: Save to Laserfiche
features.description: Allows user to save SharePoint documents to their Laserfiche repository, with admin-configured metadata mappings.

shortDescription.default: Laserfiche Sharepoint Integration connects Laserfiche and SharePoint

longDescription.default: Laserfiche Sharepoint Integration connects Laserfiche and SharePoint by allowing users to save documents to Laserfiche from SharePoint with admin-configured metadata mappings and allowing users to view their Laserfiche repository from within SharePoint.
